title: Refactor context-pane.ts to use comms store
description:
Update context-pane.ts to use comms store instead of api/ticks.ts:

1. Remove import: fetchContext from api/ticks.ts
2. Add import: fetchContext from stores/comms.ts
acceptance_criteria: context-pane.ts has no function imports from api/ticks.ts, pnpm build succeeds
closed_reason: Refactored context-pane.ts to use fetchContext from stores/comms.js
